page.title: 16Dock Work at Felixstowe
page.content: Brian Brown has been a docker for {12 years}now.He works 8 hours day shift and 8 hours night shift but he changes shifts weekly.He is part of a gang of men and is employed as a {shipworker}along with three others, four tug drivers,two crane drivers,one cargo planner and a superviser.A tug is a one seated lorry with a side engine."We have to load and unload containers and machinery," he said."Once we have had helicopters to load which I think was our most unusual object.I take off the stackers and help to hook the crane to the containers." When asked about{expansion}to the docks he said that there was an argument each way."It will supply more {jobs,}give greater security to the workers and increase Felixstowe's population."
